title: Pixel 4 XL security update keep pausing
content:
Hi, I am pixel 4 XL user since 2 weeks only, Ex-iPhone user for the last 10 years!
I got a notification on my handset that i have a security update of size 1511.6m to download, whenever i try to download the update, its just keep pausing and resume button appear, it doesnt resume the download whatsoever (keep pressing on the resume button, restart the mobile phone, connect to different Wifi network). Appreciate your feedback
